name: Automata (itch)
description:
In Automata you play as a NannyRobot, a robot made to nurse and entertain your children. Through experiencing different memories of mothers the player gets to know what it really takes to become one. Is a robot even capable to return motherly love? 

Automata is a university project developed by Katarina Mitrovic, Kevin Himmelheber and Anne Zarnecke.
